AI Description: Prodigal is a microbial gene finding program that identifies protein-coding regions in microbial genomes. It uses a combination of intrinsic and extrinsic signals to accurately predict genes in bacterial and archaeal genomes.
Core Features: Gene Prediction In Microbial Genomes, Utilizes A Combination Of Intrinsic & Extrinsic Signals For Accuracy, Supports Prediction Of Both Start & Stop Codons, Handles Overlapping Genes & Fragmented Assemblies
